SwissPublicTransport
  • Reference

API "connections" endpoint

For detailed api documentation see https://transport.opendata.ch/docs.html#connections

connections(..., .protocol = "https")

Arguments

...

from and to are required
.protocol

the connection protocol; either http or https (default)

Value

the connections as a dataframe

Examples

connections(from = "Bern", to = "Burgdorf")
#>   from.station.name to.station.name    duration from.platform to.platform
#> 1              Bern        Burgdorf 00d00:13:00             8           8
#> 2              Bern        Burgdorf 00d00:18:00           13A         13A
#> 3              Bern        Burgdorf 00d00:13:00             9           9
#> 4              Bern        Burgdorf 00d00:23:00           13A         13A
#>   transfers           from.departure from.prognosis.departure
#> 1         0 2018-02-04T20:39:00+0100 2018-02-04T20:40:00+0100
#> 2         0 2018-02-04T20:50:00+0100 2018-02-04T20:50:00+0100
#> 3         0 2018-02-04T21:07:00+0100 2018-02-04T21:07:00+0100
#> 4         0 2018-02-04T21:20:00+0100 2018-02-04T21:20:00+0100
#>   from.departureTimestamp from.delay               to.arrival
#> 1              1517773140          1 2018-02-04T20:52:00+0100
#> 2              1517773800          0 2018-02-04T21:08:00+0100
#> 3              1517774820          0 2018-02-04T21:20:00+0100
#> 4              1517775600          0 2018-02-04T21:43:00+0100
#>   to.arrivalTimestamp to.delay from.station.id to.station.id
#> 1          1517773920       NA         8507000       8508005
#> 2          1517774880       NA         8507000       8508005
#> 3          1517775600       NA         8507000       8508005
#> 4          1517776980       NA         8507000       8508005
#>   from.station.coordinate.x from.station.coordinate.y to.location.coordinate.x
#> 1                  46.94882                  7.439123                 47.06069
#> 2                  46.94882                  7.439123                 47.06069
#> 3                  46.94882                  7.439123                 47.06069
#> 4                  46.94882                  7.439123                 47.06069
#>   to.location.coordinate.y
#> 1                 7.621694
#> 2                 7.621694
#> 3                 7.621694
#> 4                 7.621694
connections(from = "Basel", to = "Bern")
#>   from.station.name to.station.name    duration from.platform to.platform
#> 1         Basel SBB            Bern 00d00:46:00             5           5
#> 2         Basel SBB            Bern 00d00:57:00             6           6
#> 3         Basel SBB            Bern 00d00:53:00            11          11
#> 4         Basel SBB            Bern 00d01:14:00             6           8

#> 1         0 2018-02-04T20:31:00+0100 2018-02-04T20:38:00+0100
#> 2         0 2018-02-04T20:59:00+0100 2018-02-04T20:59:00+0100
#> 3         0 2018-02-04T21:31:00+0100                     <NA>
#> 4         1 2018-02-04T22:04:00+0100                     <NA>
#>   from.departureTimestamp from.delay               to.arrival
#> 1              1517772660          7 2018-02-04T21:24:00+0100
#> 2              1517774340          0 2018-02-04T21:56:00+0100
#> 3              1517776260         NA 2018-02-04T22:24:00+0100
#> 4              1517778240         NA 2018-02-04T23:18:00+0100

#> 2          1517777760       NA         8500010       8507000

#> 4          1517782680       NA         8500010       8507000
